item.title: Portuguese Speaking Video Editor (Basic English Required) - Editor de Vídeo em Português - Upwork
item.description:
At Wild Vision, we're looking for talented video editors to join our team in content syndication. Your role will involve editing and adapting videos from well-known creators for platforms like Facebook, Snapchat, and YouTube Shorts. You'll be pivotal in optimising content for going viral and audience engagement. If you have a flair for video editing and a desire to shape content that resonates globally, we'd love to hear from you.

Looking for Portuguese Speaking as we are editing for Portuguese Speaking Creators.

$600 per month.
10-12 edits per day.

Na Wild Vision, procuramos editores de vídeo talentosos para se juntarem à nossa equipe de distribuição de conteúdo. Sua função envolverá a edição e adaptação de vídeos de criadores conhecidos para plataformas como Facebook, Snapchat e YouTube Shorts. Você será fundamental na otimização do conteúdo para se tornar viral e no envolvimento do público. Se você tem talento para edição de vídeo e deseja moldar conteúdo que tenha repercussão global, adoraríamos ouvir sua opinião.

Procurando por pessoas que falam português, pois estamos editando para criadores que falam português.

$ 600 por mês.
10-12 edições por dia.

wildvision.io

Budget: $600
Posted On: July 02, 2024 00:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Portuguese, English, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Portuguese, English, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Podcast Audio + Video Edit using DESCRIPT software - Upwork
item.description:
THIS JOB IS ONLY FOR SOMEONE WHO HAS EXPERIENCE USING "DESCRIPT" EDITING SOFTWARE.

I am starting a new podcast, I have actually put up a video editing job already. But realised if I can find someone who knows how to use Descript it will save me loads of time.

We have done 6 episodes so far. Each episode has video recorded from two GoPros.
4 episodes just have the two hosts, so one camera faces each of the two hosts.
Two episodes have guests. So one camera faces the hosts. One faces the guests.
All audio was recorded as individual tracks for each speaker. Recorded separately in Logic (which I will export to you)

YOUR JOB:

-Import all audio + video for each episode into Descript.
-Sync the audio + video (note: GoPro separates each long video into several shorter files, so this will take a little bit of time to align.). The video files for each episode are BIG. About 20-40gb per episode.
-Clean up audio using Descript's auto Studio Sound function.
-Edit the podcast episode so that there is one long video master, that just has the two wide shots that cut back and forth depending on who is talking.
-Edit and bounce the master of the audio for the episode (ie the one we will upload to platforms) NOTE: I don't need a lot of editing done, don't need to remove lots of words or sections etc
-Use Descript's AI function to auto generate 8-10 reels from the master video (with captions)
-Upload the master video (which is just the wide shots of the whole episode), the master audio AND the reels for each episode to a shared drive.

All of this stuff is pretty straight forward for someone that is experienced using Descript editing software.
Pls let me know if you have your own Descript subscription or if we would need to provide you with ours.
This will become an ongoing thing as we will be doing more episodes in future.
Likely between 2-4 every month.


Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: July 02, 2024 00:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Podcast, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: One Video - Video Editor for Crime YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am looking for a reliable video editor who has experience with creating fast paced videos to keep a high average viewer duration.

Looking to create a long term collaboration for a growing channel with high potential for raises as the channel progresses.

Each video will be 20-30mins long with high attention to detail. You will be provided with the script, voice file, and the video you are modeling (if applicable). You will also be working directly with a scriptwriter on our team for each video.

Must be able to find and source clips independently. Must also be able to censor explicit verbiage in the video (for monetization purposes).

The videos will be based on crime so most clips used in the videos will be footage of the crime found online and stock clips in between.

Channels we are modeling:
https://www.youtube.com/@unseentruecrime/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zNI82r71Oo8
https://www.youtube.com/@EWUCrimeStorytime/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f18SHbhbiw8

We work on a project by project basis with a standard of 2 videos per week.

You will be compensated a flat rate of $45 per video (negotiable).

Preferred:
• Understanding of the YouTube Copyright System
• Experience creating thumbnails
• An avid watcher of crime videos is a plus!

Please submit samples of your work and I look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $45
Posted On: July 02, 2024 00:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Development, YouTube, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube Development, YouTube, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Copywriting, Social Media Management, and AI chats - Upwork
item.description:
I need a good writer who can post to my social accounts.

I'm looking for an overlap, of solid copywriting skills, and above-average technical skills.

You should be able to:
- Organize a content calendar in Trello
- Design image carousels in Canva
- Schedule posts on multiple platforms
- Take my notes on an idea, and use ChatGPT to make posts in my voice
- Edit the AI-generated posts so they sound human, and not automated
- Grow followers and engagement through commenting in my voice

I'm prolific on a few different topics, and my engagement has been low for a while. I'm still producing lots of content, but it's not getting reach, views, likes, or comments. I know part of this is because I post and dash, and don't spend time liking and commenting - so that will be a good portion of the work for the first few months.

We will also collaborate on a production queue, so I can add ideas at the top, and you can schedule posts at the bottom. Translating my notes into publishable posts will be the other major focus of this position.

Nice to have skills include:
- Canva graphic design
- Descript video editing
- WordPress blogging basics

Let me know if you have any of these nice-to-haves in your application. Share with me links to TWO of your best posts (either numbers of likes or quality of content) for your clients.

Also, please begin your application with the word WRITER in all capital letters, to demonstrate you have read all the instructions. Applications that do not begin with the word WRITER will not be considered.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: July 02, 2024 00:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Social Media Strategy
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Social Media Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Podcast Editor - Upwork
item.description:
About the Agency:
We are a content marketing agency formed in January 2019 to fill a gap in the market as it relates to podcasting. There were many agencies that handled the audio editing and distribution of a podcast but few, if any, did so holistically - providing services such as audio, video, graphic design, social media, blogs, email copy, etc.

We are currently operating as an international team of 21 people from joining in from 11 different countries.


Overview of the Role:
We are seeking a talented YouTube Editor to join our team. This role involves working closely with our team to produce high-quality talking head and podcast content. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to bring creative ideas to life.

Hours: Flexible

Requirements:

- Experience as a Video Editor doing talking head and/or video podcasts on YouTube
- Next-level editing skills
- Strong visual storytelling skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- EXCELLENT communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a team.

Hiring Process:

STAGE 1: We vet down the list of candidates based on profile, portfolio, and applicable experience

STAGE 2: We will vet your skillset.

STAGE 3: The remaining candidates complete a PAID test project.

STAGE 4: Video interview.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$22.00
Posted On: July 02, 2024 00:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create, Manage, Run a YouTube explainer channel & Content - Upwork
item.description:
PLEASE PROVIDE UPFRONT PRICING - NOT HOURLY.

I prefer upfront price over hourly, but please be upfront about your price.  I set budget to $500 but am happy to go beyond that if I feel we are a good fit.

I am looking for someone to create simple, short, explainer videos on Stock Market topics such as Stocks, Options, Calls & Puts, Options Greeks, Options Strategies, etc.

You will do all the edits, creation, etc- and either I can upload to YouTube or you can.   The overall goal is not YouTube revenue, but to point visitors to my other websites.

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiybniIIvx0
https://www.youtube.com/@Wysetrade
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQ2PXJgcsxk&t=535s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NW1ziUDjB7w


Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, Finance & Accounting, YouTube Marketing, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Video Production, Graphic Design

I prefer upfront price over hourly, but please be upfront about your price.  I set budget to $500 but am happy to go beyond that if I feel we are a good fit.

I am looking for someone to create simple, short, explainer videos on Stock Market topics such as Stocks, Options, Calls & Puts, Options Greeks, Options Strategies, etc.

You will do all the edits, creation, etc- and either I can upload to YouTube or you can.   The overall goal is not YouTube revenue, but to point visitors to my other websites.

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiybniIIvx0
https://www.youtube.com/@Wysetrade
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQ2PXJgcsxk&t=535s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NW1ziUDjB7w


Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, Finance & Accounting, YouTube Marketing, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: YouTube, Finance & Accounting, YouTube Marketing, Content Writing, Creative Writing, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Video Production, Graphic Design

item.title: Video Editor and Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I’m Dr Catalina, The Intimacy Doc❤️
I'm a Clinical Psychologist specializing in sex & relationships.

I’m looking for someone to support editing of my long-form video content.  First content will be produced/edited for YouTube to be a 10-12min video.  Next, I’d like the YT video to be spliced into 8-10, 1-2 min videos for TikTok and IG.   

Deliverables include:
​​1 Long-form YouTube video YT thumbnail (this will increase to 2 in a month or 2)
YT Title description with Time stamp, key words and description
14-21 shorts each week with end screen bringing people back to YT


Weekly tasks will include: (please outline your experience and KPI's for engagement and conversion for each of these tasks)
- Production and editing of YouTube videos.  Executing videos to be YouTube quality to foster engagement and community,
-production (adding captions, tagline, trending music, and a caption generated from a Prompt I've created for Chat GPT) of short form videos 1-3min
- scheduling of video content (2-3 posts/day) I create across platforms (TT, IG, YT, FB, Pinterest) - I'm happy to sign up for an online scheduler you've worked successfully with for automatic scheduled posting
- weekly zoom check-ins first month to ensure we're on the same page, then moving forward bi-monthly
- using Asana/clickup/notion to keep track of tasks and timeline (I have an account I can add you on)
- Using google doc/online scheduler for content calendar I'll share media to

Experience needed:
- 1+ years experience supporting social media accounts on TikTok & YT and IG
- understanding of short and long-form videos
- Proven track record of supporting growing accounts with KPIs
- US based

Before applying please have a look at me IG and TikTok @TheIntimacyDoc to get a sense of my work.

In applying please address the questions below.  Only applications addressing these questions will be reviewed:
- why do you want to work for me in particular?
- provide a portfolio of your work with links and social handles of clients
-  outline the ROI you've provided prior clients and evidence of growth with KPIs
- brief strategy of how you envision us working together
-proposed fee
- your availability to meet via Zoom Fridays and Mondays

Cheers,
Dr Catalina



Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Management
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Management
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Job Posting: Meme Video Editor ( Beluga Style ) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor who can replicate the fast-paced, humorous editing style of the popular YouTube channel, Beluga. This position is ideal for someone experienced with high-energy editing techniques and a knack for comedic timing.
You are the best fit if you can:

Utilize fast-paced editing to keep viewers engaged.
Implement zoom-in/out effects effectively.
Incorporate meme clips seamlessly.
Infuse humor into the edits to enhance viewer enjoyment.
Note: The reason we are looking for a Beluga-style editor is due to the similarities in editing techniques required. Examples of required editing styles include:
Quick transitions
Zooming in on characters for emphasis
Adding relevant and humorous meme clips
Keeping the content light-hearted and engaging
What We Offer:
Consistent work with long-term potential.
Opportunity to grow and innovate within the role.

Example Videos: https://www.youtube.com/@AsRezouYT/videos                                                         https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKQUGM-C0Eo
How to get Hired? : Fill out this Job posting Google form with all the details: https://forms.gle/HbnsVD6nXTVPDGKf9 If you have a passion for creating engaging and humorous content and have experience with Beluga-style editing, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $18.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video and Photo Editor for Social Media Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video and photo editor who is experienced in color grading and cinematography. Your main responsibility will be to edit content for our social media platforms including Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for aesthetics and a deep understanding of visual storytelling. You must be skilled in using professional editing software and have a portfolio that demonstrates your ability to create visually stunning videos and photos. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are essential. If you are passionate about creating captivating content that engages our audience, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Photo editing
- Color grading
- Cinematography
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Creativity

item.title: Build and create AI generated videos and post them on YouTube. - Upwork
item.description:
I need 5 Videos with 5 AI Avatars (1 in each video) made. The videos must be made using AI Tools (paid version). 1 video made and submitted every week with daily updates on the progress.

Audio and motion needs to be in each video. Some videos may also require subtitles. Creativity needs to be there in terms of imagination.

No copy/paste of others work. (Re-fund would be requested in this situation)

How would you do it? Have you ever worked on similar projects or do you have samples to show here? *(I would be visiting your profile to see your portfolio project). What tools would you use? You having technical skills; what 1 creative idea would you share regarding this project, about its implementation?

Would need them in formats for Tiktok, Instagram Post, Reels, LinkedIn, Facebook, Snapchat, YouTube.

When its video creation. Prompt are supposed to be used for the video creation.

Hiring Process:
1:1 virtual (15-30 mins) virtual interview. Needs to be good in technical knowledge because every video would be cross checked by the dimension required for every platform.

This would be 1 month long project. With 4 contract reviews per week (Payment is divided in 4 sections).

Why?
I value time over money. This way, I get to learn.

What's in for you?
You would make money (That's for sure). You might learn.

The experiment works out, you can land a long term client (That might bring in referrals).

You can ask me about how to creating business strategies for growth. Why Marketing and Sales play a vital role for your business. How can you make (Don't boost the proposal as I will be going through everyone of them) outbound sales easier, etc.

This project starts next month. Also, did you boost your proposal? (Write your answer in form of Y/N in the first line of your proposal, otherwise, I'll consider you aren't serious in your own business.)

This might become a long term project based on the results the experiment generates. Think original while writing your proposal (add number or percentages if you worked on something previously). I didn't use AI to write this nor would I accept AI made proposals (I'll know if it's AI).

Thank you,
A


Budget: $20
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:38 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Animation, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Animation, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, 2D Animation
Country: Pakistan

item.title: Video Editor + Motions Graphics for E-commerce Product Promo Videos. - Upwork
item.description:
I manage a few Amazon brands and have a project to create 3 (30 sec) promo videos.

I have footage with models and an interview with the founder of the company that I want the audio used during each of the promos.

Looking for someone to put this together, add music, and informative text in a visually appealing way.

The products are for an all natural supplement brand. Looking for something clean, eye catching, and informative!

If you have prior Amazon video ad experience that is a plus, but not needed.

Please just send over a brief intro about your experience and attach an example of your favorite video ad that you created.

This has the potential to turn into ongoing work since I manage multiple brands.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$40.00

item.title: Product Video Creator for Quirky Device - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and creative video creator to produce a captivating product video for our quirky device. The video should highlight the unique features and benefits of the device in an engaging and entertaining way. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating product videos that effectively communicate the value and functionality of a product.

   Responsibilities:
   - Conceptualize and storyboard the product video
   - Shoot and edit high-quality footage
   - Add appropriate music, sound effects, and graphics
   - Ensure the video effectively showcases the device's features and benefits

   Requirements:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong storytelling and visual communication skills
   - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

   If you have a passion for creating compelling product videos and have a knack for capturing the attention of viewers, we would love to hear from you!

   Please provide examples of your previous product video work, along with your application.

   Note: We are seeking someone near Cambridge but can be flexible about location

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 23:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Graphic Design
Country: USA
click to apply
